1: lpadmin -p OfficeLaser -D 'Fuji Xerox DocuPrint CP225/228' -m 'foo2zjs:0/ppd/foo2zjs/Fuji_Xerox-DocuPrint_CM215.ppd' -o PageSize=A4 -o ColorMode=Color -v usb://FUJI%20XEROX/DocuPrint%20CP225/228%20w?serial=301943--CD

0:
mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_*
restic unlock
restic backup /data
restic forget --keep-weekly 1 --prune

mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_* 
restic init || true

gitlab_enterprise:
  bot:
    username: Codecov

setup:
  debug: no
  loglvl: INFO

  guest_access: off
  admins:
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Saphir
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Alexsaphir

  http:
    cookies_domain: ${DOMAIN_NAME}

  timeseries:
    enabled: false

  telemetry:
    enabled: false

notifications:
  slack: off
  gitter: off
  webhook: off
  irc: off
  hipchat: off

cd /opt/cloudbeaver \
&& cp -R conf drivers run-server.sh samples server web /cb/ \
&& chown 1000:1000 -R /cb/* \
&& ls -lah /cb/
